summary: This module defines a test suite that exercises the helper functions provided by the Cython utilities package. It includes a lightweight iterator cache class and a collection of unit tests that verify version string creation, cache name handling, cache attribute discovery and clearing, float representation normalization, version output, and a tryâ€‘finally context manager.
business_intent: Ensure that core utility components used throughout Cython projects behave correctly and remain stable, reducing the risk of bugs in version handling, caching mechanisms, numeric formatting, and resource cleanup.
